body_html: @ruotianluo I do also come across this problem by mistake. I change the tensor y to an variable, the problem is fixed. But in what situation we will do the operation that cat the tensor and variable. It's not used very common.

body: @ruotianluo I do also come across this problem by mistake. I change the tensor `y` to an variable, the problem is fixed. But in what situation we will do the operation that cat the tensor and variable. It's not used very common.
